casebody.data:
STRAW POND ASSOCIATES, LLC, et al.
v.
FITZPATRICK, MARIANO & SANTOS, P.C., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2016

Raymond J. Plouffe, Jr., in support of the petition.

Brenden P. Leydon, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 691, 145 A.3d 292 (2016), is denied.
